EmailTemplate.name: Fleet One O/O App Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Fleet One Credit App Approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!OnlineApplication__c.Contact_Name__c},
Congratulations! Your application for the WEX Fleet One Over-The-Road fuel card has been approved. For your convenience, your new cards will be mailed active and they will be ready for immediate use.
Please note, your 4-digit pin number will be mailed to you in a separate envelope, and will arrive shortly before or after your new fuel cards.
Please keep the following information accessible at all times as it will not be mailed to you –
Online user info. You will need this information to manage your account online. Supervisor/authorized contact security codes. You will need these codes whenever you call in to our 24 hour customer care.
Thank you for your interest in WEX Fleet One. If you have any questions about the application, please don’t hesitate to call or email me.
Sincerely,
{!User.Name} {!User.Title} WEX Fleet One Phone: {!User.Phone} | Fax: {!User.Fax} {!User.Email} | www.FleetOne.com
To opt out of all email marketing messages from WEX Fleet One, click here from the email address you wish to unsubscribe.
